description: Registers sources (network interfaces) with the specified transit gateway multicast group. A multicast source is a network interface attached to a supported instance that sends multicast traffic. For more information about supported instances, see Multicast on transit gateways in the Amazon Web Services Transit Gateways Guide. After you add the source, use SearchTransitGatewayMulticastGroups to verify that the source was added to the multicast group.

parameters.name: TransitGatewayMulticastDomainId
parameters.description: The ID of the transit gateway multicast domain.

parameters.name: NetworkInterfaceIds
parameters.description: The group sources' network interface IDs to register with the transit gateway multicast group. (string) ---

nested_items.name: RegisteredMulticastGroupSources
nested_items.description: Information about the transit gateway multicast group sources.

nested_items.name: TransitGatewayMulticastDomainId
nested_items.description: The ID of the transit gateway multicast domain.

nested_items.name: RegisteredNetworkInterfaceIds
nested_items.description: The IDs of the network interfaces members registered with the transit gateway multicast group.

nested_items.name: GroupIpAddress
nested_items.description: The IP address assigned to the transit gateway multicast group.
